document.heading: COMMERCIAL DRIVER’S LICENSE MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENT AMENDMENT ACT OF 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-220, the “Commercial Driver’s License Minimum Age Requirement Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-325, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 1, 2010, and June 15, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 28, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-445 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-220 became effective on September 24, 2010.
